Perceptor/nightlight/Elita/Windlord/Kup/Talon

Nighlight Smiled and squeezed Rodimus's hand while she lay down, she was 
getting better and with more energy with every second that passed "ELita?, 
where is she? how is she?"

Elita waved her little tail when she hear her mom calling her, she was 
impatient to go and give her a big hug, but she knew that she had to wait 
till her dad and Perceptor decided that it was time

*******************************
Kup watched the scene, letting the couple have time together. While Windlord 
retired still feeling guilty for his part.

***************************
Perceptor walked away of the maximals almost following Lord Elder, with no a 
real purpose by now.

********************************
Talon smiled and kissed Tucson "I bet that you did" and added with a smile 
"do you like to have a walk with me?? that will let you relax a bit"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Friday, June 03, 2011 11:20 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: the ARK to awaken from sleep!

> <OLD>
>
> 'The Ark'
>
> Those words lighted up her face, all was finally over, she  huged tightly
> her husband and started to sob, realeasing her spark of all her fears, and
> pain.  Two male figure watched the scene in a corritor without disturb: 
> Kup
> and windlord .

<NEW>

Rodimus just sat there as holding his darling wife as slowly energy
began to fill her systems. �Take it easy.� He said to her as he gently
tried to allow her to lay back and rest. �We have so many things to
catch up on so many things to do.�

For the moment work was forgotten, all other cares and concerns were
put to the side as he sat there and looked at Nightlight just so happy
that she was alive again with her full memories.

Yes, things were looking good.

> <OLD>
>
> Kup had a wide smile in his face and Windlord looked more serious, still 
> he
> remember all the pain that hydras forced him to do... Or more accurately 
> he
> willing did as Predacon

> <OLD>
>
> Perceptor laughted quietly and said "If you want to do that not know
> LEgacy's faction, what would you do with me that still I'm a predacon?"
> then he smirked, and stated to observe the reacion of Nightlight and 
> smiled
> "She seems to be totally healed and with no psicological damage... 
> Amazing"

<NEW>

Outside Leo II walked up and through the glass. �It seems we have
cause to celebrate.� He said.

�And so many things to think about.� Torca said causing Leo II to look at 
him.

�It�s why I came back.� Torca said in response to the look.

Both he and Leo had just come out of the recharging chambers and
looked as if they had just walked off the assembly line.

Leo II nodded, �Yes I know.� He looked saddened and then looked back
at Rodimus through the glass again. �There are going to be some hard
choices to make.�


> <OLD>
>
> Uproar winces with a sheepish look on his face.
>
> "Ooops, I - didn't hear ya comming.. Okay, okay, so yeah, I'm rankn' on 
> 'em
> my bad. But seriously, okay, Legacy works well in battles but his social
> skills, leave lots ta be desired."
>
> Straight Shot shrugs.
>
> "I'm staying out of this. I'm not the one who brought up the counting
> thing."
>
> Quickstride nudges Uproar.
>
> "Nice going, open mouth insert paw."
>
> Uproar shrugs.
>
> " Well, it's kinda true. Every time we try ta ask 'em a question we get
> blown off."
>
> Straight Shot nodds.
>
> " Yeah, that part is kind of right. He's not exactly the most sociable
> part, and nothing against him but, he is treading on thin ice with Tucson
> sir, and I really think someone should talk to Tucson before he blows his
> own stack. I can see it in my brother's face, there's an air about him 
> that
> seems troubling. One of these days a real fight between them will break 
> out
> and there may be no way ta stop it. I tried talking to Tucson but he's as
> stubborn as Ratchet in that respect. So, how do we hold the peace with 
> both
> of them, because I'd really like ta know that."

<NEW>

As Straightshot, Uproar, Quickstride and Perceptor talked Lord Elder
stopped but kept his back to them a smile blooming across his face. As
they talked about what they truly thought of Legacy and his
relationship with Tuscon Elder nodded and turned his face now more
somber and sober.

�You are right.� He said as he walked back towards them. �I had
trouble getting to know Legacy, even though it was just me and him
guarding the Ark together for a while.�

Elder shrugged, �Heck, sometimes I STILL feel like I don�t know him
well.� He glanced at each of them. �But maybe we can all try a little
harder.�

Glancing back in the direction of where Tuscon was Elder nodded
solemnly. �I will see if I can talk with Tuscon.� He looked back at
the others. �If they got into it I don�t know who would win the
battle, but I also feel they it would not be good . . . for any of
us.�

> <OLD>
>
> "The would be a Prime problem"commended dryly the Predacon

<NEW>

Elder looked back at the others, a smile coming back on his face.
�Perhaps you guys should take the time to get to know Perceptor a
little better. After all, up until now we have only known him an
adversary.� Lord Elder gestured at Perceptor with a friendly shooing
motion.

�I will, in the mean time go and have a talk with Tuscon.� Elder
turned to walk away.

(TAG)

Preston
